function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 through air conditioning systems in buildings without proper filters","Impact":"Increased risk of droplet infection through airflow","Mitigation":"Add alternative ventilation methods and secure ventilation rates per person","Technologies":"General-performance filters, commercial package-type air conditioners, fan coil units","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Inadequate airflow in poorly ventilated rooms","Impact":"Increased risk of infection when spending time with an infected person","Mitigation":"Continuous ventilation and directional airflow control","Technologies":"Air conditioners with directional airflow control","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building managers, maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Potential negative impact of natural ventilation on air balance in accordance with building laws","Impact":"Potential deviation from building sanitation laws","Mitigation":"Consultation with experts and consideration of industry guidelines","Technologies":"Consultation with experts","People":"Building managers, architects","Owner":"Building managers, architects"}]}
